item.description: First attempt at what I lovingly refer to as ‚ÄúMeal C‚Äù (after the letter it‚Äôs assigned at my favourite cha chaan teng, New Town Bakery in Vancouver), chicken chow mein. I may have slightly undercooked the chicken (not brown enough). The carrots and bok choy were nice additions. https://t.co/8ulhTSpsp0

item.description:
A dude remarked remarked on my DJ Shadow shirt at the grocery store just now. We had a conversation about it.

It‚Äôs only ever been dudes. I‚Äôd wonder if there were any women DJ Shadow fans if I didn‚Äôt know the reason why women don‚Äôt remark on what I wear.
item.source:markdown:

item.description:
This video is 8 years old, and already the Toronto streetscape in it looks dated. https://t.co/pxEnwanCx2

Zimmerman says they‚Äôre going to take Richmond at the outset, but he meant Adelaide. At one point, they roll by the park near where I live currently.

Even what they talk about, especially near the end, didn‚Äôt age well: A Canadian celebrity they mention would become disgraced only a few months later.
item.source:markdown:
This video is 8 years old, and already the Toronto streetscape in it looks dated. https://t.co/pxEnwanCx2
Zimmerman says they‚Äôre going to take Richmond at the outset, but he meant Adelaide. At one point, they roll by the park near where I live currently.
Even what they talk about, especially near the end, didn‚Äôt age well: A Canadian celebrity they mention would become disgraced only a few months later.

item.description: I‚Äôm tying a knot in this thread. The emergency phase of the pandemic is over, and none of my crushes talk to me, so I‚Äôm going to mute (and, over time, unfollow) them so that they don‚Äôt come to mind so often.
item.source:markdown: I‚Äôm tying a knot in this thread. The emergency phase of the pandemic is over, and none of my crushes talk to me, so I‚Äôm going to mute (and, over time, unfollow) them so that they don‚Äôt come to mind so often.

item.description: The thought occurred to me that this might be the last winter I spend in Toronto.
item.source:markdown: The thought occurred to me that this might be the last winter I spend in Toronto.

item.description:
Good article, though it doesn‚Äôt mention speech therapy. It‚Äôs expensive, but it can work (I‚Äôm proof of that). https://t.co/80mxMhV9l7

‚ÄúThe 2017 World Series MVP doesn‚Äôt have a trigger for his stutter, though he knows when it‚Äôs about to happen and can modify his speech to work around it.‚Äù

That rings true. I know some of my triggers, and warming up my voice and remembering to breathe before talking helps a lot.
item.source:markdown:
Good article, though it doesn‚Äôt mention speech therapy. It‚Äôs expensive, but it can work (I‚Äôm proof of that). https://t.co/80mxMhV9l7
‚ÄúThe 2017 World Series MVP doesn‚Äôt have a trigger for his stutter, though he knows when it‚Äôs about to happen and can modify his speech to work around it.‚Äù
That rings true. I know some of my triggers, and warming up my voice and remembering to breathe before talking helps a lot.

item.description:
It was funny when, during the initial meetup for divorced male gamers in Toronto, the organizer had to excuse himself because his ex-wife was calling him.

Whenever Frank Ocean‚Äôs ‚ÄúNights‚Äù comes on the playlist, I think of that guy when he sings üé∂ ‚ÄúHope you‚Äôre doing well, bruh.‚Äù üé∂
